scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && npm install && watchman watch-del-all && react-native link && react-native run-android
scripts.build: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ../ && npm start --reset-cache
scripts.init: npm install && mkdir android/app/src/main/assets && react-native link
scripts.bundle: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.bundle-android: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.android.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --sourcemap-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.map --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/
